channel.title: English Posts on Hugo-HT
channel.description: Recent content in English Posts on Hugo-HT

item.title: Please never say: I have never done this before
item.description: I had been resistant to building a website by myself. It may result from my working experience that I was the one who planned and layout the websites asking the product manager, developer, and designer to deploy and set them. I used to think programming was a waste of time compared with thinking of new ideas and optimizing my copywriting (clearly, I prefer copywriting to designing or programming). However, now, I am building my website.

item.title: New post
item.description: I am making a new post now. Hello.
